title: 320W Charging Station for Multiple Devices, Zobirez 10-Port USB C Fast Charger Stations for MacBook, iPhone, Android Cell Phone, iPad, Tablet, Family Multi-Device Organizer Charging Dock, Black 5FT Black
description: 10-Port Charging Station Organizer: Unlike charging stations with only USB-A ports, our multi-device charging station features 5 USB-C ports, delivering a total output of up to 320W. It includes 8 short mixed charging cables and can conveniently store and charge up to 10 devices simultaneously. This phone charging station helps eliminate messy cables and the need for multiple wall chargers, keeping your desk tidy and organized.

top_reviews.title: Great charging options!
top_reviews.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: Most other options had more USB ports than USB-C ports. I like how this has more USB-C ports for faster charging. Design: Fits both my phones and my kids' iPads with the cases attached. Ease of use: Simple. Build quality: Strong quality holders vs. plastic that comes off easily from other products. Functionality: Comes with a variety of cords for charging all your devices. Read more
